${ModID}:AbstinenceQuest.TITLE: Abstinence
${ModID}:AbstinenceQuest.DESCRIPTION: Don't use potions for the next #b4 combats.
${ModID}:AbstinenceQuest.AUTHOR: Gk

${ModID}:BasicProficiencyQuest.TITLE: Basic Proficiency
${ModID}:BasicProficiencyQuest.AUTHOR: Gk
EXTRA_TEXT: Play a specified starter card #b3 times in one combat.

${ModID}:BountyICQuest.TITLE: Bounty: Red Menace
${ModID}:BountyICQuest.DESCRIPTION: A menace of fire and iron threatens this place. The next elite this act is replaced by the #rIronclad.
${ModID}:BountyICQuest.AUTHOR: Gk
${ModID}:BountyICQuest.REWARD: Replace the rewards with good #rIronclad themed ones.
